mapper.insert: insert into board ( member_idx, title, ingr, content, fileName ) values ( #{member_idx}, #{title}, #{ingr}, #{content}, #{fileName} )
mapper.select: select b.*, m.userid as member_userid from board B join member m on m.idx = b.member_idx order by b.idx desc
select b.*, m.userid as member_userid, m.fileName as member_fileName from board B join member m on m.idx = b.member_idx where b.idx=#{idx}
select b.*, m.userid as member_userid from board b join member m on m.idx = b.member_idx where ingr like '%${keyword}%' order by b.idx desc

select b.*, m.userid as member_userid from board b join member m on m.idx = b.member_idx where
ingr like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%'
order by b.idx desc
select b.*, m.userid as member_userid from board b join member m on m.idx = b.member_idx where ingr not like '%${excludeKeyword}%' order by b.idx desc
select b.*, m.userid as member_userid from board b join member m on m.idx = b.member_idx where (ingr like '%${keyword}%') and not (ingr like '%${excludeKeyword}%') order by b.idx desc
mapper.update: update board set viewCount = viewCount + 1 where idx = #{idx}
